name: Fishing Catch Fish
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/oflg/fishing-catchfish">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/oflg/fishing-catchfish"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://tiddlymemo.org/manual/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://tiddlymemo.org/manual/"/></$button>

<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"><$list filter="[<lang>search[zh]]">[[钓鱼|https://tiddlymemo.org/manual/zh-Hans#%E9%92%93%E9%B1%BC%E6%8F%92%E4%BB%B6]]的渐进阅读子插件。用来渐进阅读已有或者导入的条目。可在阅读中摘录句子，也可注释单词并配合单词学习包来学习外语。</$list><$list filter="[<lang>!search[zh]]">Incremental Reading plugin for [[Fishing|https://tiddlymemo.org/manual/zh-Hans#%E9%92%93%E9%B1%BC%E6%8F%92%E4%BB%B6]]. Use to incrementally read existing or imported tiddlers.You can excerpt sentences as you read, or annotate words with the Learning Pack and learn foreign languages.</$list></$list>
